description.value: Your ancestors lived underground. Your ears are larger than those of other hobgoblins and sensitive to echoes. When you are underground, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] action to sense @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] creatures within a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] instead of a @Template[type:burst|distance:15]. In addition, if you roll a success on an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Squeeze], you get a critical success instead.

rules.text: When you roll a success to Squeeze, you get a critical success instead.
rules.title: {item|name}
